2. Avoid scissors as an opening move (seems "weak" psychologically)
3. May follow simple patterns like rock-paper-scissors in sequence
4. Tend to repeat winning moves

Psychology Expert: I agree. Paper is the strategically sound choice here. You're exploiting the common psychological tendency of fresh players to open with rock.
